dc_title_s: Lacus Lemani vicinorumque locorum nova et accurata descriptio.; Lacvs lemani vicinorvmq locorvm nova et accvrata descriptio
dc_description_s: Relief shown pictorially. Includes the inscription "Benevole lector F. Franciam, G. Genevam de notat. Haec volebam nescius ne esses. Vale et nostros conatus boni consule" and illustrations of ships and sea monsters on Lake Geneva. This state was published in atlases by Jan Jansson in 1630, 1631-33, and 1632. From the Jansson Appendix Atlas 1636-1680, title created to represent a unique collection within the Clark Library, University of Michigan. 1 map; 35 x 47 cm. This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
dc_creator_sm: Jansson, Jan, 1588-1664.,Hondius, Jodocus, 1594 or 1595-1629, cartographer.,Jansson, Jan, 1588-1664. Appendix Atlas.,Vignaud, Henry, 1830-1922, former owner.
